name: Furious Driver 3D
description:
Lose the cops with tricky maneuvers and zigzag your way to freedom!

Outrunning the officers behind you is not an easy task. Stay calm at the wheel, dodge the obstacles and get away from the police! Cop cars break around you, cars crash, but you need to stay on the road no matter what. They are still on your tail. Barrel along at crazy speeds, plow through barriers, pull hard on the wheel and hit the brakes!

All of a sudden, it’s all quiet. You made it!

Features:
• Energetic gameplay
• Dynamic cinematography
• Smooth controls
• Amazing art style
• Engaging levels
• Furious cars!
